## AppLoadTest - ASP.NET Core Application

This is an ASP.NET Core web application designed for load testing scenarios.

### Project Structure
- Controllers: API and MVC controllers
- Views: Razor views for web interface  
- Models: Data models and view models
- Services: Business logic and data access
- Configuration: App settings and startup configuration

### Development Guidelines
- Follow ASP.NET Core best practices
- Use dependency injection for services
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Include appropriate unit tests
- Use async/await for database and external API calls
